name: Even For Eternia
description: Take control of six unlikely heroes as they set out on a journey to discover the source of their mysterious power: The power of becoming an Umbra. Experience a full-length RPG adventure with multiple astounding mechanics and characters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 Ghz or similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 Ghz or similar Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
